title: Thailand: Citi Advance Opens Central Plaza Chiangmai Airport Branch; Launches "Limitless Opportunities" Campaign
summary: Citi Advance has opened its 41st branch at the Central Plaza Chiangmai Airport, the largest shopping and entertainment complex in Chiangmai, Thailand.
tag-1: Thailand: Citi Advance Opens Central Plaza Chiangmai Airport Branch; Launches "Limitless Opportunities" Campaign
tag-2: Citi Advance has opened its 41st branch at the Central Plaza Chiangmai Airport, the largest shopping and entertainment complex in Chiangmai, Thailand.
tag-3: This new opening marks the launch of Citi Advance's new campaign "Limitless Opportunities." Chiangmai has been selected to be the first location in Thailand, ahead of Bangkok and other provinces, to unveil the new campaign due to its market potential and readiness.
tag-4: The latest branch will offer such features and services as a customer-centric financial and credit advisory service, unsecured and secured personal loans with fast approval service and non-Citi Advance products such as Citibank product referrals, credit card and revolving credit, and insurance referrals.
tag-5: At present, there are 40 Citi Advance branches nationwide, including 28 branches in Bangkok and Greater Bangkok (inclusive of 11 shopping mall based branches) and 12 branches upcountry.
tag-6: Mrs. Vira-anong C. Phutrakul, Chairman of the Board of Citicorp Leasing (Thailand) Ltd., said: "In August 2006, Citi Advance launched its first branch on Chiangpheuk road, located north of Chiangmai. As Chiangmai is a big city of nearly 500,000 households with a population of approximately 1.6 million, we have seen continuous growth in terms of the economy, tourism industry and investment, making it the biggest business center in the north of Thailand. Chiangmai's great market potential is the reason we have decided to open another branch of our Citi Advance here today.
tag-7: "The opening of Central Plaza Chiangmai Airport branch will be very convenient for the people of Chiangmai and nearby provinces, giving them easier access to highly professional and individually tailored financial advice and services that respond to their specific needs," added Mrs Vira-anong.
tag-8: Citi Advance, a consumer finance brand, was officially launched in 2008. Citi Advance offers flexible financial options, targeting those with medium and high incomes (based on a salary of 15,000 baht per month and up). Currently, Citi Advance is the market leader in secured and unsecured personal loans with a total of 40 branches nationwide. It provides financial and credit advisory services and introduces appropriate financial products in order to respond to the individual needs of our customers.
tag-9: "Our staff is well-trained so they can respond to our customers' every financial need, offering financial advice and loan products that specifically suit their unique lifestyle and spending habits. This ranges from daily spending, business start-ups, medication, education and home improvements, to family activities such as weddings and vacations," said Mrs Vira-anong
tag-10: In celebration of the new branch opening, Citi Advance offers a 1,000 baht Central Department Store voucher and special rates, including a fee waiver of 2 percent when customers receive personal loans from Citi Advance (minimum loan size of 100,000 baht and above). This offer is valid at both Citi Advance branches at Central Plaza Chiangmai Airport and at Changphuak Road till 30 November 2011.
tag-11: Citi Advance Central Plaza Chiangmai Airport branch operates daily from 11 a.m. to 8 p.m. For further information, contact 053-904-490-95.
tag-12: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
